paragraphs.context: While intermittent fasting and eating a ketogenic (high-fat, low-carb, moderate protein) diet will dramatically reduce your risk of chronic disease, lectins may still cause trouble. One of the primary issues is autoimmune diseases.

qas.question: What else can you tell me about lectins?

answers.text: While intermittent fasting and eating a ketogenic (high-fat, low-carb, moderate protein) diet will dramatically reduce your risk of chronic disease, lectins may still cause trouble.

qas.question: What is one of the primary issues with lectins?

answers.text: One of the primary issues is autoimmune diseases.
